summary: A coming-of-age story about a 13-year-old girl trying to fit into both a posh private school and an ordinary public school.
cast: Danielle Catanzariti|Cassandra Jinman|Talia Monaghan|Yen Yen Stender|Laura Kettle|Lucy Carey|Tisha Adey|Leticia Monaghan|Christian Byers|Keisha Castle-Hughes|Essie Davis|Edwin Hodgeman|Russell Dykstra|Vanessa Downing|Poh Ling Yeow|Bridget Walters|Esme Proudman|Deidre Rubenstein|Tony Mack|Caitlin McDougall|Jonny Pasvolsky|Elise Champion|Nikita Adams|Daniela Ganter|Toni Collette|Alex DeGaris-Boot|Mark Gaweda|Lyn Pike|Patrick Frost|Joey Kennedy|Kurt Bayly|Mark Fantasia|Peta Kova|Jonathan Segat|Klayton Stainer
title: Hey Hey It's Esther Blueburger
